definitions.definition: The originator or creator of a work , especially of a literary composition ; or, one of the creators of a collaborative work.
examples: The copyright of any original writing belongs initially and properly to its author .
Have you read any Corinthian authors ?

definitions.definition: The initial owner of the copyright to a work, especially a work made for hire or a work of corporate authorship.
examples: The author named on the copyright registration for the Android robot is Google Inc.

definitions.definition: Someone who writes books for a living.
Principal ; the primary participant in a crime .
One's authority for something: an informant .
The creator or cause of anything.

main_definition: The originator or creator of a work , especially of a literary composition ; or, one of the creators of a collaborative work.
secondary_definitions: ( US copyright law ) The initial owner of the copyright to a work, especially a work made for hire or a work of corporate authorship.
Someone who writes books for a living.
( obsolete , criminal law ) Principal ; the primary participant in a crime .
( archaic ) One's authority for something: an informant .
( figurative ) The creator or cause of anything.
